data.title: Loni Anderson Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Loni Anderson on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Loni Anderson including All Dogs Go to Heaven, A Night at the Roxbury, andâ¦
data.text:
Of Guilt, Models and Murder

David Banner suspects he might actually be a killer after he emerges from one of his blackouts as the Hulk at the scene of a murder. Haunted by the fear he may have killed a beautiful young model during his transformation as the Hulk, Banner returns to the scene of the crime and gets a job as a playboyâs valet. The job almost ends up with Banner a prisoner in a car headed for a trash compactor.

What Goes Up, Must Come Down

Kimberly asks Peter to take Michael out of town for a few days so that she can have time to herself. Michael and Peter head to Palm Springs, where they are judges in a teen beauty pageant.
